headline: Data Science for Social Good Summer Projects - Fellow Applications Are Open!
text: Following the success of the previous Data Science for Social Good initiative in the UK, the University of Warwick has opened applications for the 2022 DSSGx UK summer projects programme. The programme will run over 12 weeks from 6 June to 26 August 2022, and the plan this year is to hold it face to face, at Warwick, Covid-19 permitting.

headline: Data Science for Social Good Summer Projects - Student Applications Are Open!
text: Students who have a passion for data science, care about the social good, and love to work in an international team of top talent, are invited to apply by 14 February 2022 at 12:00noon GMT
